attributes.action: Reconsider the decision to close gyms in Tier 4 areas
attributes.additional_details: Not taking regular exercise increases the risk of cardiovascular disease and things like blood pressure as well as having an impact on people's mental health which is why this petition was created.
attributes.background: The purpose of this petition is to get the government to reconsider the decision to close gyms in Tier 4 areas in England since closing them would severely limit opportunities  for those in Tier 4  to exercise particularly at this time of year with poorer weather conditions.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

Keep gyms open during Tier 4 lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563904
